snippet.title: Remnants of the Precursors - Let's Play as the Humans!
snippet.description:
ROTP beta has had another big update and we're getting close to it being finished. BATTLEMODE takes a look at the game again, this time playing as the Humans on a 70 Star map on Harder difficulty. 

Remnants of the Precursors is a feature complete Java remake of the original space 4x game Master of Orion, developed by Ray Fowler and is available absolutely free of charge for everybody at www.remnantsoftheprecursors.com.

www.explorminate.co
